The typical architecture of an MLLM involves the following components:
Converts image data into embeddings. Commonly uses CLIP, ViT, or ResNet.
Converts text into contextual embeddings. Often based on GPT, BERT, or LLaMA.
Generates output tokens (answers, captions, summaries) autoregressively.
